org.openadaptor.core.transaction
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  org.openadaptor.core.transaction.AbstractTransaction
      org.openadaptor.core.transaction.Transaction
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransaction
public class Transaction
extends AbstractTransaction

Basic (and default) implementation of ITransaction that collects and invokes ITransactionalResources.

Author:
perryj
